summary: A graphical modification that aims to achieve photo realistic graphics in Skyrim, similar to game titles such as Crysis and Battlefield.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/15105-1-1343114921.png[/img]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff][U][I]FEATURES:    [/I]	  [/U]								   [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]The absolute highest quality ssao, reflection and detailed shadows[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]Godrays/Lightshafts[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]Realistic skin and hair [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]High quality Bokeh Depth of field[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]photorealistic lighting [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]Flora and vegetation based on Crysis' lighting[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]Nights based on Crysis[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]Daytime skylighting based on Battlefield 3/4[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]Uses directional lighting[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]Vibrant colours[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[B][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffffff]Photorealistic water[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B]
[FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#7030a0][SIZE=7][U][I][B]Video previews:[/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT]
 [youtube]8eq1ygQPsow[/youtube] [youtube]lidNPr5wvuc[/youtube] 
[youtube]A2DS-0ebnwE[/youtube]   [youtube]YZsXkVUljn8[/youtube]
[youtube]SrasXaxxh94[/youtube]    [youtube]Fpy0zocRSMI[/youtube]
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/110/2963473-1334683228.jpg[/img]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#00b0f0][U]Install guide:[/U][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Times New Roman]
[/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#00b050][U]Classic version:[/U][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#ffffff]1. Just unpack to the Skyrim directory (where the launcher is)[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#ffffff]2. Download the d3d9.dll from http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0102.htm[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#ffffff]Just download the file by clicking the downwards facing arrow in the box. [/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#ffffff]Then take the d3d9.dll from the downloaded file and also place it in your skyrim directory.[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#ffffff]3.Activate all esps that come with the mod.[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR=#ffffff]4. Enjoy!
Classic installation video: 
[youtube]gXdGxYXfMUw[/youtube] [/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Times New Roman]
[/FONT][/SIZE]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#8064a2][B][I][U]Version 5:[/U][/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]1. Place all files extracted from the downloaded file, into the Skyrim directory, where your skyrim launcher is.[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]2. Then download the d3d9.dll from http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0231.htm[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]Just download the file by clicking the downwards facing arrow in the box. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]Then take the d3d9.dll from the downloaded file and place it in your skyrim directory. (where the launcher is)[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]3. Enjoy! :)[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][B][I]
[/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]IMPORTANT! Both versions require these changes in your SkyrimPrefs.ini, this is located in "my documents", then from there, go to "my game" and finally open the folder called "Skyrim"! [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][B][I]
[/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]bDrawLandShadows=1[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I]bShadowsOnGrass=1

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/110/2963473-1382983354.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/110/2963473-1383076372.jpg[/img][/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][B][I][U]
[/U][/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#e36c09][B][I][U]Uninstall guide: [/U][/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][B][I]
[/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][B][I]
[/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]Delete all files in the directory and data folder that came within this mod (the file you downloaded)[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][B][I][U]
[/U][/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ff0000][B][I][U]Troubleshooting:[/U][/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][B][I]
[/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][B][I]
[/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]Do not download are install with Nexus mod manager! I left that option so people can see when I update, manual install only! [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]ENB is NOT compatible with 3rd party tools OSD, such as MSI afterburner, EVGA precision,etc... [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]That's why you get immediate CTDs. Disable these tools OSD by creating a TESV.exe profile for them and disabling OSD for this app. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]Doing so, you can still run Afterburner for overclocking profiles, and run ENB at the same time. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]ENB has got its own integrated FPS counter, as stated by Quad2core.[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]This mod achieves its visuals through, effects lighting and colour, no textures other than a sun glare and white water fix are present :) [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]Grass shadows are a problem introduced in the 1.5 skyrim patch. These are fixed in later versions of this mod, the classic version unfortunately will never be fixed due to the games engine.[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffffff][B][I]Thank you for using Sharpshooter's extreme graphics ENB, if you have any questions or problems that haven't been answered here, feel free to ask them in the comments section of this mod :)!
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/110/2963473-1382983318.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/110/2963473-1383073681.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/110/2963473-1382983387.jpg[/img]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][B][I]
[/I][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I][U]Credits:[/U][/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits also go to ENBseries creator's Boris Vorontsov for ENB[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits go to the amazing user wildeyes for giving me something to start with. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to JJC71 for some great advice and support, a truly great guy![/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to reaper1982, beta tester and support, a great guy![/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to Diegog 5 for screenshots and feedback[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to Matso for permission to use his dof[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to Sung9533 for permission to use some aspects of his configuration[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to Confidence man for his glowing water at night fix[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to tromezee for finding a crossfire fix[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to Althear for permission to include his water fix[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to SamEkinci and xDoshux for their patch[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffc000][B][I]Credits to the realistic lighting with customisation team![/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/110/2963473-1334615902.jpg[/img]
author: Sharpshooter8

files.name: Sharpshooter enb classic version no dof
files.fileName: Sharpshooter enb classic version no dof-15105-V1.rar
